name: Katina Saga 7: Planet of the Frogues
name_original: Katina Saga 7: Planet of the Frogues
description: Katina, Zax, and Gehirn are escorting Cecil the Frogue back to Herpaton. Katina is much more interested in Hargon's Helm that is in the possession of General Tursus, the sworn enemy of the Frogues. Elsewhere Hu-Man and his new friend meet an old friend on their quest to find the Eye of Kraytor. More exciting action, nail biting suspense, and emotional storytelling in Katina Saga 7: Planet of the Frogues.
